root.name: Star Wars: Demolition
root.description: StoryJabba the Hutt has organized a tournament in which competitors fight to the death across stages from the star wars universe. Each of the thirteen playable characters has their own motive to win the tournament. A cutscene specific to each character is played at the the start and finish of the tournament.VehiclesRancorJetpackLandspeederPodracerAT-STTrade Federation Battle TankDesert SkiffSnowspeeder
